title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message:
Macbook air no backlight with no real history. Board has been cleaned with liquid indicators tripped. 

There is an image on screen, just no backlight

BKLT_PWM (With Screen) - 1.47V

BKLT_PWM (Without Screen)-  2.6V (without screen)

BKLT_EN - 2.7V

Changed driver with no change. Also replaced r7704 and c7704 with no change.

Diode mode on BKLT_PWM - .526

Should I assume bad CPU/PCH on this...?

Thanks!

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message: Nah I don't think so. What voltage are you getting on backlight currently? Also diode mode on backlight output?

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message:
Check continuity between D7701 and A5 ball of U7701.
Pay atention to XW7720 bridge.
Search the forum for that and you will find some recent threads with detailed explanations...
Post voltages for D7701 pins.

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message: Will get back with that info. Thanks guys!!

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message:
This is all set. Thanks guys!!

Have a good one.

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message:
Please leave a feedback about your solution.
This can help someone else in the future...

title: 820-3747 BKLT_PWM Low.
message:
There happened to be a slight crack on pin 1 side of L7701. No sure how that would cause BKLT_PWM to be low, but it works.

Thanks, have a good one.
